hints.content:
Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a38fce76f4bf7b902c5c4e0202089095fea34ebe)

$354=\purpleD{3}\text{ hundreds} + \blueE{5}\text{ tens} + \maroonD{4}\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one hundred into tens, we will see that $1\text{ hundred}= 10\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c372c3bcf29ff756e7c045ec7186ec8af75d650)

So, $\purpleD1\text{ hundred} = \blueE{10}\text{ tens}$

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/7274bdecc82e2f72fead766d172fcb5a6e37baef)

$\blueE{30}\text{ tens} + \blueE5\text{ tens} +\maroonD4\text{ ones}= \blueE{35}\text{ tens}+\maroonD4\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one ten into ones, we will see that $1\text{ ten}= 10\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e4fdf448967cc3f80b9adac27e4758efcc081e2c)

So, $\blueE{35}\text{ tens} = \maroonD{350}\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/98fe41af78868b7d8084868a131b096cdc6249a3)

$\maroonD{350}\text{ ones} + \maroonD4\text{ ones} = \maroonD{354}\text{ ones}$

question.content:
**Complete the equations.**

 |  | |  | | | | |
-: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: 
$354 =$|$3$ |$\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$| $5$ | $\text{ tens}$ | $+$ | $4$ |$\text{ ones}$
$354=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 1]] | $\text{tens}$ |$+$ | $4$ | $\text{ ones}$
$354=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | $0$| $\text{ tens}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 2]] | $\text{ones}$
